# llms.txt for aaronwolf.dev


## Sitemap reference
Sitemap: https://yourdomain.com/sitemap.xml

## About
Aaron Wolf dev - development for everyone

This website provides comprehensive programming documentation and blog posts focused on Python and JavaScript development.

## Site Structure

### Main Sections
- Home: https://aaronwolf.dev/
- About: https://aaronwolf.dev/about
- Contact: https://aaronwolf.dev/contact
- Blog: https://aaronwolf.dev/blog

### Documentation

#### Python Documentation
- Language Reference: https://aaronwolf.dev/docs/coding/python/language_reference
  - Comprehensive reference for Python built-in types, functions, and keywords
  - Includes: int, float, string, list, dict, tuple, set, bool, None, and more
  
- User Guide: https://aaronwolf.dev/docs/coding/python/user_guide
  - Functions: basic functions, lambda, decorators, higher-order functions, args and kwargs
  - Iterables: lists, tuples, dictionaries, sets, ranges, sequences, comprehensions, for loops, while loops
  - Object-Oriented Programming: intro, instances, instance methods, dunder methods, inheritance, encapsulation, polymorphism, class attributes
  - Standard Library: modules, exceptions, file handling, datetime, JSON
  - Types, Variables, and Conditionals: types, variables, conditionals

#### JavaScript Documentation
- Language Reference: https://aaronwolf.dev/docs/coding/javascript/language_reference
  - Comprehensive reference for JavaScript built-in types, functions, and keywords
  - Includes: Number, String, Boolean, Object, Array, null, undefined, Symbol, BigInt, Function, Date, RegExp, Map, Set, WeakMap, WeakSet, Promise, Class, async/await, generators

### Blog
Technical blog posts covering various programming topics, including:
- React and web development
- JavaScript concepts (Promises, async/await, URL API, Temporal)
- Encryption and security
- System administration (Linux, Samba)
- And more

## Technical Details
- Built with Docusaurus
- Supports mathematical notation (KaTeX)
- Dark mode by default
- Responsive design
